briefTitle: Study of Information Received About Fertility and Infertility in Patients Who Have Finished Treatment for Cancer
officialTitle: Descriptive Study to Evaluate the Information and Psychosocial Issues on the Risk on Infertility in Cancer Patients After Receiving Treatment in a Comprehensive Cancer Center
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Amount of information received on aspects of fertility and infertility
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Diagnosis of breast cancer, germ cell tumor, colon cancer, leukemia, lymphoma, or sarcoma

  * Free of disease
* Completed treatment within the past 1-2 years

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* ECOG performance status 0-1
* Must be able to read and self-complete study questionnaires
* No psychological conditions that may prevent participation in the study

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* See Disease Characteristics
* No concurrent treatment (hormonal treatment for breast cancer is allowed)
